text:
A year ago, you were kidnapped by Dr. Hallervorden's henchmen. For the past

year, you have been subjected to his demented experiments. You are stronger

and more capable than when you came in, but nothing remains of your mind but

rage.



This morning, your cell door swung open on its own. It is time to escape!

At last, you are face to face with your mad tormenter Dr. Hallervorden. He

holds a massive, deadly-looking laser weapon, and he barks a bitter laugh

as he notices you enter the room.

"You thought it would be so easy!" he grumbles hoarsely. "TIME TO DIE!"
